A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The fact that this movie has lower user score than episode I and episode II means there’s something seriously wrong with humanity. This movie was really good! Yes\, there’s a lot of slow sections and yes\, some of the characters didnt need to be in this movie\, like the Asian chick who was going around with Finn. If you look past these flaws though\, you will find that it’s a really enjoyable (although flawed) feature.
